doc:
Jack Nelson (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Nelson_(actor) 0 Judd Asher Nelson (born November 28, 1959) is an American actor who is best known for his roles as John Bender in The Breakfast Club, Alec Newbary in St. Elmo's Fire, Hot Rod and Rodimus Prime in The Transformers: The Movie and Transformers: Animated, Joe Hunt in Billionaire Boys Club, Nick Peretti in New Jack City, Billy Beretti in Empire, and Jack Richmond in the television series Suddenly Susan. Judd_Asher_Nelson ( born November_28_,_1959 ) is an_American_actor who is_best_known for his_roles as John_Bender in The_Breakfast_Club , Alec_Newbary in St._Elmo 's_Fire , Hot_Rod and Rodimus_Prime in The_Transformers : The_Movie_and_Transformers : Animated , Joe_Hunt in Billionaire_Boys_Club , Nick_Peretti in New_Jack_City , Billy_Beretti in Empire , and Jack_Richmond in the_television_series_Suddenly_Susan .
